document.full_text: oil collapsed into free-fall on thursday, diving as much as 10 percent and sending u.s. crude back under $100 a barrel as investors staged a nearly unprecedented stampede for the exits.
document.title: oil crashes 10 percent in record rout
lines_and_colors: oil collapsed into free-fall on thursday, diving as much as 10 percent and sending u.s. crude back under $100 a barrel as investors staged a nearly unprecedented stampede for the exits.
